item.title: Automatic Flap Load Relief Retraction System (Trailing Edge)

remarks.para: Flaps 30 retractor may be inoperative provided Flaps 30 adjusted maximum landing weight is observed.

note.para: Flaps 25 may be used to maximum landing weight.

numlitem.para: Landing Weight Reduction - Flaps 30 Structural Landing Weight reduced to 183,000 lbs.
Landing Weight Reduction - Flaps 30 Structural Landing Weight reduced to 183,000 lbs.

placard.para: Placard next to Flap Handle "AUTO FLAP LOAD RELIEF INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
